verses.text: 1 "JESUS_END"Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ, which is our hope;
2 "JESUS_END"Unto Timothy, my own son in the faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-3/" title="1 Timothy 1:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3  "JESUS_END"As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus, when I went into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine,
4 "JESUS_END"Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which minister questions, rather than godly edifying which is in faith: so do.
5 "JESUS_END"Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and of a good conscience, and of faith unfeigned:
<a href="../1-Timothy-1-6/" title="1 Timothy 1:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling;

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-7/" title="1 Timothy 1:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"Desiring to be teachers of the law; understanding neither what they say, nor whereof they affirm.
8 "JESUS_END"But we know that the law is good, if a man use it lawfully;

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-9/" title="1 Timothy 1:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"Knowing this, that the law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and disobedient, for the ungodly and for sinners, for unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-10/" title="1 Timothy 1:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10  "JESUS_END"For whoremongers, for them that defile themselves with mankind, for menstealers, for liars, for perjured persons, and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine;

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-11/" title="1 Timothy 1:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-12/" title="1 Timothy 1:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord, who hath enabled me, for that he counted me faithful, putting me into the ministry;
13 "JESUS_END"Who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: but I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-14/" title="1 Timothy 1:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14  "JESUS_END"And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
15 "JESUS_END"This is a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-16/" title="1 Timothy 1:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16  "JESUS_END"Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.
17 "JESUS_END"Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-18/" title="1 Timothy 1:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"This charge I commit unto thee, son Timothy, according to the prophecies which went before on thee, that thou by them mightest war a good warfare;

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-19/" title="1 Timothy 1:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19  "JESUS_END"Holding faith, and a good conscience; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck:

<a href="../1-Timothy-1-20/" title="1 Timothy 1:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20  "JESUS_END"Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander; whom I have delivered unto Satan, that they may learn not to blaspheme.
